sqlMap.select:
SELECT GOODS.GOODS_CD , GOODS.GOODS_NM , TO_CHAR(A.CNT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS TOTAL_CNT1 , TO_CHAR(A.SETL_APPR_AMT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS TOTAL_SETL_APPR_AMT1 , TO_CHAR(A.PRCLTAXIN,'FM999,999,999,999') AS TOTAL_PRCLTAXIN1 , TO_CHAR(B.CNT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS WEB_CNT1 , TO_CHAR(B.SETL_APPR_AMT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS WEB_SETL_APPR_AMT1 , TO_CHAR(B.PRCLTAXIN,'FM999,999,999,999') AS WEB_PRCLTAXIN1 , TO_CHAR(C.CNT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS PO_CNT1 , TO_CHAR(C.SETL_APPR_AMT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS PO_SETL_APPR_AMT1 , TO_CHAR(C.PRCLTAXIN,'FM999,999,999,999') AS PO_PRCLTAXIN1 , TO_CHAR(D.CNT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS MO_CNT1 , TO_CHAR(D.SETL_APPR_AMT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS MO_SETL_APPR_AMT1 , TO_CHAR(D.PRCLTAXIN,'FM999,999,999,999') AS MO_PRCLTAXIN1 , TO_CHAR(E.CNT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS TOTAL_CNT2 , TO_CHAR(E.SETL_APPR_AMT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS TOTAL_SETL_APPR_AMT2 , TO_CHAR(E.PRCLTAXIN,'FM999,999,999,999') AS TOTAL_PRCLTAXIN2 , TO_CHAR(F.CNT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS WEB_CNT2 , TO_CHAR(F.SETL_APPR_AMT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS WEB_SETL_APPR_AMT2 , TO_CHAR(F.PRCLTAXIN,'FM999,999,999,999') AS WEB_PRCLTAXIN2 , TO_CHAR(G.CNT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS PO_CNT2 , TO_CHAR(G.SETL_APPR_AMT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS PO_SETL_APPR_AMT2 , TO_CHAR(G.PRCLTAXIN,'FM999,999,999,999') AS PO_PRCLTAXIN2 , TO_CHAR(H.CNT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS MO_CNT2 , TO_CHAR(H.SETL_APPR_AMT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS MO_SETL_APPR_AMT2 , TO_CHAR(H.PRCLTAXIN,'FM999,999,999,999') AS MO_PRCLTAXIN2 FROM GD_GOODS_MAST GOODS , ( SELECT OOI.GOODS_CD , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT) SETL_APPR_AMT , SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN) PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_MAST OOM , OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOM.ORDER_ID = OOS.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd1#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd1#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.GOODS_CD ORDER BY GOODS_CD) A , (SELECT OOI.GOODS_CD , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT) SETL_APPR_AMT , SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN) PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_MAST OOM , OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOM.ORDER_ID = OOS.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD = '01' AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd1#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd1#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.GOODS_CD ORDER BY GOODS_CD) B , (SELECT OOI.GOODS_CD , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT) SETL_APPR_AMT , SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN) PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_MAST OOM , OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOM.ORDER_ID = OOS.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD IN ('02', '04', '05') AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd1#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd1#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.GOODS_CD ORDER BY GOODS_CD) C , (SELECT OOI.GOODS_CD , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT) SETL_APPR_AMT , SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN) PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_MAST OOM , OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOM.ORDER_ID = OOS.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD IN ('03', '06') AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd1#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd1#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.GOODS_CD ORDER BY GOODS_CD) D , ( SELECT OOI.GOODS_CD, OOI.GOODS_NM , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT) SETL_APPR_AMT , SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN) PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_MAST OOM , OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOM.ORDER_ID = OOS.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd2#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd2#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.GOODS_CD, OOI.GOODS_NM ORDER BY GOODS_CD) E , (SELECT OOI.GOODS_CD , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT) SETL_APPR_AMT , SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN) PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_MAST OOM , OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOM.ORDER_ID = OOS.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD = '02' AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd2#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd2#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.GOODS_CD ORDER BY GOODS_CD) F , (SELECT OOI.GOODS_CD , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT) SETL_APPR_AMT , SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN) PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_MAST OOM , OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOM.ORDER_ID = OOS.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD IN ('02', '04', '05') AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd2#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd2#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.GOODS_CD ORDER BY GOODS_CD) G , (SELECT OOI.GOODS_CD , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT) SETL_APPR_AMT , SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN) PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_MAST OOM , OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOM.ORDER_ID = OOS.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD IN ('03', '06') AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd2#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd2#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.GOODS_CD ORDER BY GOODS_CD) H WHERE GOODS.GOODS_CD = A.GOODS_CD(+) AND GOODS.GOODS_CD = B.GOODS_CD(+) AND GOODS.GOODS_CD = C.GOODS_CD(+) AND GOODS.GOODS_CD = D.GOODS_CD(+) AND GOODS.GOODS_CD = E.GOODS_CD(+) AND GOODS.GOODS_CD = F.GOODS_CD(+) AND GOODS.GOODS_CD = G.GOODS_CD(+) AND GOODS.GOODS_CD = H.GOODS_CD(+)
GOODS.GOODS_CD IN
#goodsCdArr[]#

SELECT BASE.CODE , '특산물' AS NAME , BASE.CODE_NAME , TO_CHAR(INFO.CNT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS CNT , TO_CHAR(INFO.SETL_APPR_AMT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS SETL_APPR_AMT , TO_CHAR(INFO.PRCLTAXIN,'FM999,999,999,999') AS PRCLTAXIN FROM (SELECT 'PO' AS CODE, '창구판매' AS CODE_NAME, 1 AS SORT_ORDER FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'WEB' AS CODE, '온라인' AS CODE_NAME, 2 AS SORT_ORDER FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'MO' AS CODE,'모바일' AS CODE_NAME, 3 AS SORT_ORDER FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'CALL' AS CODE, '콜센터' AS CODE_NAME, 4 AS SORT_ORDER FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'TOTAL' AS CODE, '소계' AS CODE_NAME, 5 AS SORT_ORDER FROM DUAL) BASE ,(SELECT OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD, OOM.ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT) SETL_APPR_AMT , SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN) PRCLTAXIN FROM (SELECT ORDER_ID, DECODE(ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD, '01', 'WEB', '02', 'PO', '04', 'CALL', '05', 'PO', '03', 'MO', '06', 'MO') AS ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD FROM OD_ORDER_MAST) OOM , OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOS.ORDER_ID = OOM.ORDER_ID AND OOS.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND PAVLN_DIV_CD = '01' AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd1#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd1#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD, OOM.ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD UNION SELECT OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD , 'TOTAL' AS ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT) SETL_APPR_AMT , SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN) PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOS.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD = '01' AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd1#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd1#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD) INFO WHERE BASE.CODE = INFO.ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD(+) ORDER BY BASE.SORT_ORDER

SELECT BASE.CODE , '특산물' AS NAME , BASE.CODE_NAME , TO_CHAR(INFO.CNT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS CNT , TO_CHAR(INFO.SETL_APPR_AMT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS SETL_APPR_AMT , TO_CHAR(INFO.PRCLTAXIN,'FM999,999,999,999') AS PRCLTAXIN FROM (SELECT 'PO' AS CODE, '창구판매' AS CODE_NAME, 1 AS SORT_ORDER FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'WEB' AS CODE, '온라인' AS CODE_NAME, 2 AS SORT_ORDER FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'MO' AS CODE,'모바일' AS CODE_NAME, 3 AS SORT_ORDER FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'CALL' AS CODE, '콜센터' AS CODE_NAME, 4 AS SORT_ORDER FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'TOTAL' AS CODE, '소계' AS CODE_NAME, 5 AS SORT_ORDER FROM DUAL) BASE ,(SELECT OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD, OOM.ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT) SETL_APPR_AMT , SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN) PRCLTAXIN FROM (SELECT ORDER_ID, DECODE(ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD, '01', 'WEB', '02', 'PO', '04', 'CALL', '05', 'PO', '03', 'MO', '06', 'MO') AS ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD FROM OD_ORDER_MAST) OOM , OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOS.ORDER_ID = OOM.ORDER_ID AND OOS.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND PAVLN_DIV_CD = '01' AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd2#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd2#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD, OOM.ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD UNION SELECT OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD , 'TOTAL' AS ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT) SETL_APPR_AMT , SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN) PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOS.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD = '01' AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd2#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd2#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD) INFO WHERE BASE.CODE = INFO.ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD(+) ORDER BY BASE.SORT_ORDER

SELECT BASE.CODE , '제철식품' AS NAME , BASE.CODE_NAME , TO_CHAR(INFO.CNT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS CNT , TO_CHAR(INFO.SETL_APPR_AMT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS SETL_APPR_AMT , TO_CHAR(INFO.PRCLTAXIN,'FM999,999,999,999') AS PRCLTAXIN FROM (SELECT 'PO' AS CODE, '창구판매' AS CODE_NAME, 1 AS SORT_ORDER FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'WEB' AS CODE, '온라인' AS CODE_NAME, 2 AS SORT_ORDER FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'MO' AS CODE,'모바일' AS CODE_NAME, 3 AS SORT_ORDER FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'CALL' AS CODE, '콜센터' AS CODE_NAME, 4 AS SORT_ORDER FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'TOTAL' AS CODE, '소계' AS CODE_NAME, 5 AS SORT_ORDER FROM DUAL) BASE ,(SELECT OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD, OOM.ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT) SETL_APPR_AMT , SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN) PRCLTAXIN FROM (SELECT ORDER_ID, DECODE(ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD, '01', 'WEB', '02', 'PO', '04', 'CALL', '05', 'PO', '03', 'MO', '06', 'MO') AS ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD FROM OD_ORDER_MAST) OOM , OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOS.ORDER_ID = OOM.ORDER_ID AND OOS.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND PAVLN_DIV_CD = '02' AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd1#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd1#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD, OOM.ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD UNION SELECT OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD , 'TOTAL' AS ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT) SETL_APPR_AMT , SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN) PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOS.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD = '02' AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd1#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd1#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD) INFO WHERE BASE.CODE = INFO.ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD(+) ORDER BY BASE.SORT_ORDER

SELECT BASE.CODE , '제철식품' AS NAME , BASE.CODE_NAME , TO_CHAR(INFO.CNT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS CNT , TO_CHAR(INFO.SETL_APPR_AMT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS SETL_APPR_AMT , TO_CHAR(INFO.PRCLTAXIN,'FM999,999,999,999') AS PRCLTAXIN FROM (SELECT 'PO' AS CODE, '창구판매' AS CODE_NAME, 1 AS SORT_ORDER FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'WEB' AS CODE, '온라인' AS CODE_NAME, 2 AS SORT_ORDER FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'MO' AS CODE,'모바일' AS CODE_NAME, 3 AS SORT_ORDER FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'CALL' AS CODE, '콜센터' AS CODE_NAME, 4 AS SORT_ORDER FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'TOTAL' AS CODE, '소계' AS CODE_NAME, 5 AS SORT_ORDER FROM DUAL) BASE ,(SELECT OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD, OOM.ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT) SETL_APPR_AMT , SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN) PRCLTAXIN FROM (SELECT ORDER_ID, DECODE(ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD, '01', 'WEB', '02', 'PO', '04', 'CALL', '05', 'PO', '03', 'MO', '06', 'MO') AS ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD FROM OD_ORDER_MAST) OOM , OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOS.ORDER_ID = OOM.ORDER_ID AND OOS.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND PAVLN_DIV_CD = '02' AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd2#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd2#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD, OOM.ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD UNION SELECT OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD , 'TOTAL' AS ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT) SETL_APPR_AMT , SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN) PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOS.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD = '02' AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd2#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd2#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD) INFO WHERE BASE.CODE = INFO.ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD(+) ORDER BY BASE.SORT_ORDER

SELECT OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD AS CODE , '생활마트' AS NAME , TO_CHAR(COUNT(*),'FM999,999,999,999') CNT , TO_CHAR(SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT),'FM999,999,999,999') SETL_APPR_AMT , TO_CHAR(SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN),'FM999,999,999,999') PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOS.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND PAVLN_DIV_CD = '03' AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd1#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd1#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD

SELECT OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD AS CODE , '생활마트' AS NAME , TO_CHAR(COUNT(*),'FM999,999,999,999') CNT , TO_CHAR(SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT),'FM999,999,999,999') SETL_APPR_AMT , TO_CHAR(SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN),'FM999,999,999,999') PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOS.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND PAVLN_DIV_CD = '03' AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd2#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd2#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD

SELECT BASE.CODE , '꽃배달' AS NAME , BASE.CODE_NAME , TO_CHAR(INFO.CNT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS CNT , TO_CHAR(INFO.SETL_APPR_AMT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS SETL_APPR_AMT , TO_CHAR(INFO.PRCLTAXIN,'FM999,999,999,999') AS PRCLTAXIN FROM (SELECT 'PO' AS CODE, '창구판매' AS CODE_NAME, 1 AS SORT_ORDER FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'WEB' AS CODE, '온라인' AS CODE_NAME, 2 AS SORT_ORDER FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'MO' AS CODE,'모바일' AS CODE_NAME, 3 AS SORT_ORDER FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'CALL' AS CODE, '콜센터' AS CODE_NAME, 4 AS SORT_ORDER FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'TOTAL' AS CODE, '소계' AS CODE_NAME, 5 AS SORT_ORDER FROM DUAL) BASE ,(SELECT OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD, OOM.ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT) SETL_APPR_AMT , SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN) PRCLTAXIN FROM (SELECT ORDER_ID, DECODE(ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD, '01', 'WEB', '02', 'PO', '04', 'CALL', '05', 'PO', '04', 'MO', '06', 'MO') AS ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD FROM OD_ORDER_MAST) OOM , OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOS.ORDER_ID = OOM.ORDER_ID AND OOS.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND PAVLN_DIV_CD = '04' AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd1#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd1#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD, OOM.ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD UNION SELECT OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD , 'TOTAL' AS ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT) SETL_APPR_AMT , SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN) PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOS.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD = '04' AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd1#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd1#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD) INFO WHERE BASE.CODE = INFO.ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD(+) ORDER BY BASE.SORT_ORDER

SELECT BASE.CODE , '꽃배달' AS NAME , BASE.CODE_NAME , TO_CHAR(INFO.CNT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS CNT , TO_CHAR(INFO.SETL_APPR_AMT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS SETL_APPR_AMT , TO_CHAR(INFO.PRCLTAXIN,'FM999,999,999,999') AS PRCLTAXIN FROM (SELECT 'PO' AS CODE, '창구판매' AS CODE_NAME, 1 AS SORT_ORDER FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'WEB' AS CODE, '온라인' AS CODE_NAME, 2 AS SORT_ORDER FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'MO' AS CODE,'모바일' AS CODE_NAME, 3 AS SORT_ORDER FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'CALL' AS CODE, '콜센터' AS CODE_NAME, 4 AS SORT_ORDER FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'TOTAL' AS CODE, '소계' AS CODE_NAME, 5 AS SORT_ORDER FROM DUAL) BASE ,(SELECT OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD, OOM.ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT) SETL_APPR_AMT , SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN) PRCLTAXIN FROM (SELECT ORDER_ID, DECODE(ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD, '01', 'WEB', '02', 'PO', '04', 'CALL', '05', 'PO', '04', 'MO', '06', 'MO') AS ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD FROM OD_ORDER_MAST) OOM , OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOS.ORDER_ID = OOM.ORDER_ID AND OOS.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND PAVLN_DIV_CD = '04' AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd2#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd2#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD, OOM.ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD UNION SELECT OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD , 'TOTAL' AS ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT) SETL_APPR_AMT , SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN) PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOS.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD = '04' AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd2#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd2#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD) INFO WHERE BASE.CODE = INFO.ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD(+) ORDER BY BASE.SORT_ORDER

SELECT OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD AS CODE , '전통시장' AS NAME , TO_CHAR(COUNT(*),'FM999,999,999,999') CNT , TO_CHAR(SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT),'FM999,999,999,999') SETL_APPR_AMT , TO_CHAR(SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN),'FM999,999,999,999') PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOS.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND PAVLN_DIV_CD = '05' AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd1#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd1#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD

SELECT OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD AS CODE , '전통시장' AS NAME , TO_CHAR(COUNT(*),'FM999,999,999,999') CNT , TO_CHAR(SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT),'FM999,999,999,999') SETL_APPR_AMT , TO_CHAR(SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN),'FM999,999,999,999') PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOS.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND PAVLN_DIV_CD = '05' AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd2#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd2#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD

SELECT OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD AS CODE , '해외배송' AS NAME , TO_CHAR(COUNT(*),'FM999,999,999,999') CNT , TO_CHAR(SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT),'FM999,999,999,999') SETL_APPR_AMT , TO_CHAR(SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN),'FM999,999,999,999') PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOS.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND PAVLN_DIV_CD = '07' AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd1#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd1#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD

SELECT OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD AS CODE , '해외배송' AS NAME , TO_CHAR(COUNT(*),'FM999,999,999,999') CNT , TO_CHAR(SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT),'FM999,999,999,999') SETL_APPR_AMT , TO_CHAR(SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN),'FM999,999,999,999') PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOS.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND PAVLN_DIV_CD = '07' AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd2#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd2#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD

SELECT OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD AS CODE , 'B2B' AS NAME , TO_CHAR(COUNT(*),'FM999,999,999,999') CNT , TO_CHAR(SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT),'FM999,999,999,999') SETL_APPR_AMT , TO_CHAR(SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN),'FM999,999,999,999') PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOS.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND PAVLN_DIV_CD = '08' AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd1#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd1#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD

SELECT OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD AS CODE , 'B2B' AS NAME , TO_CHAR(COUNT(*),'FM999,999,999,999') CNT , TO_CHAR(SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT),'FM999,999,999,999') SETL_APPR_AMT , TO_CHAR(SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN),'FM999,999,999,999') PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOS.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND PAVLN_DIV_CD = '08' AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd2#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd2#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD

SELECT OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD AS CODE , '기타매출' AS NAME , TO_CHAR(COUNT(*),'FM999,999,999,999') CNT , TO_CHAR(SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT),'FM999,999,999,999') SETL_APPR_AMT , TO_CHAR(SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN),'FM999,999,999,999') PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOS.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND PAVLN_DIV_CD NOT IN ('01', '02', '03', '04', '05', '07', '08') AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd1#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd1#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD

SELECT OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD AS CODE , '기타매출' AS NAME , TO_CHAR(COUNT(*),'FM999,999,999,999') CNT , TO_CHAR(SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT),'FM999,999,999,999') SETL_APPR_AMT , TO_CHAR(SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN),'FM999,999,999,999') PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOS.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND PAVLN_DIV_CD NOT IN ('01', '02', '03', '04', '05', '07', '08') AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd2#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd2#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.PAVLN_DIV_CD

SELECT SUPP.SUPP_COMP_ID , SUPP.BCNC_NM , TO_CHAR(A.CNT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS TOTAL_CNT1 , TO_CHAR(A.SETL_APPR_AMT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS TOTAL_SETL_APPR_AMT1 , TO_CHAR(A.PRCLTAXIN,'FM999,999,999,999') AS TOTAL_PRCLTAXIN1 , TO_CHAR(B.CNT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS WEB_CNT1 , TO_CHAR(B.SETL_APPR_AMT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS WEB_SETL_APPR_AMT1 , TO_CHAR(B.PRCLTAXIN,'FM999,999,999,999') AS WEB_PRCLTAXIN1 , TO_CHAR(C.CNT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS PO_CNT1 , TO_CHAR(C.SETL_APPR_AMT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS PO_SETL_APPR_AMT1 , TO_CHAR(C.PRCLTAXIN,'FM999,999,999,999') AS PO_PRCLTAXIN1 , TO_CHAR(D.CNT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS MO_CNT1 , TO_CHAR(D.SETL_APPR_AMT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS MO_SETL_APPR_AMT1 , TO_CHAR(D.PRCLTAXIN,'FM999,999,999,999') AS MO_PRCLTAXIN1 , TO_CHAR(E.CNT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS TOTAL_CNT2 , TO_CHAR(E.SETL_APPR_AMT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS TOTAL_SETL_APPR_AMT2 , TO_CHAR(E.PRCLTAXIN,'FM999,999,999,999') AS TOTAL_PRCLTAXIN2 , TO_CHAR(F.CNT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS WEB_CNT2 , TO_CHAR(F.SETL_APPR_AMT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS WEB_SETL_APPR_AMT2 , TO_CHAR(F.PRCLTAXIN,'FM999,999,999,999') AS WEB_PRCLTAXIN2 , TO_CHAR(G.CNT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS PO_CNT2 , TO_CHAR(G.SETL_APPR_AMT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS PO_SETL_APPR_AMT2 , TO_CHAR(G.PRCLTAXIN,'FM999,999,999,999') AS PO_PRCLTAXIN2 , TO_CHAR(H.CNT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS MO_CNT2 , TO_CHAR(H.SETL_APPR_AMT,'FM999,999,999,999') AS MO_SETL_APPR_AMT2 , TO_CHAR(H.PRCLTAXIN,'FM999,999,999,999') AS MO_PRCLTAXIN2 FROM CO_SUPP_COMP_MAST SUPP , ( SELECT OOI.SUPP_COMP_ID , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT) SETL_APPR_AMT , SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN) PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_MAST OOM , OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOM.ORDER_ID = OOS.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd1#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd1#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.SUPP_COMP_ID) A , (SELECT OOI.SUPP_COMP_ID , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT) SETL_APPR_AMT , SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN) PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_MAST OOM , OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOM.ORDER_ID = OOS.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD = '01' AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd1#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd1#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.SUPP_COMP_ID) B , (SELECT OOI.SUPP_COMP_ID , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT) SETL_APPR_AMT , SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN) PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_MAST OOM , OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOM.ORDER_ID = OOS.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD IN ('02', '04', '05') AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd1#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd1#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.SUPP_COMP_ID) C , (SELECT OOI.SUPP_COMP_ID , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT) SETL_APPR_AMT , SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN) PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_MAST OOM , OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOM.ORDER_ID = OOS.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD IN ('03', '06') AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd1#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd1#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.SUPP_COMP_ID) D , ( SELECT OOI.SUPP_COMP_ID , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT) SETL_APPR_AMT , SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN) PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_MAST OOM , OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOM.ORDER_ID = OOS.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd1#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd1#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.SUPP_COMP_ID) E , (SELECT OOI.SUPP_COMP_ID , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT) SETL_APPR_AMT , SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN) PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_MAST OOM , OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOM.ORDER_ID = OOS.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD = '02' AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd1#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd1#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.SUPP_COMP_ID) F , (SELECT OOI.SUPP_COMP_ID , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT) SETL_APPR_AMT , SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN) PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_MAST OOM , OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOM.ORDER_ID = OOS.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD IN ('02', '04', '05') AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd1#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd1#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.SUPP_COMP_ID) G , (SELECT OOI.SUPP_COMP_ID , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT) SETL_APPR_AMT , SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN) PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_MAST OOM , OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOM.ORDER_ID = OOS.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD IN ('03', '06') AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd1#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd1#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.SUPP_COMP_ID) H WHERE SUPP.SUPP_COMP_ID = A.SUPP_COMP_ID(+) AND SUPP.SUPP_COMP_ID = B.SUPP_COMP_ID(+) AND SUPP.SUPP_COMP_ID = C.SUPP_COMP_ID(+) AND SUPP.SUPP_COMP_ID = D.SUPP_COMP_ID(+) AND SUPP.SUPP_COMP_ID = E.SUPP_COMP_ID(+) AND SUPP.SUPP_COMP_ID = F.SUPP_COMP_ID(+) AND SUPP.SUPP_COMP_ID = G.SUPP_COMP_ID(+) AND SUPP.SUPP_COMP_ID = H.SUPP_COMP_ID(+)
SUPP.SUPP_COMP_ID IN
#suppArr[]#

SELECT TO_CHAR(SUM(A.CNT),'FM999,999,999,999') AS TOTAL_CNT1 , TO_CHAR(SUM(A.SETL_APPR_AMT),'FM999,999,999,999') AS TOTAL_SETL_APPR_AMT1 , TO_CHAR(SUM(A.PRCLTAXIN),'FM999,999,999,999') AS TOTAL_PRCLTAXIN1 , TO_CHAR(SUM(B.CNT),'FM999,999,999,999') AS WEB_CNT1 , TO_CHAR(SUM(B.SETL_APPR_AMT),'FM999,999,999,999') AS WEB_SETL_APPR_AMT1 , TO_CHAR(SUM(B.PRCLTAXIN),'FM999,999,999,999') AS PO_PRCLTAXIN2 , TO_CHAR(SUM(H.CNT),'FM999,999,999,999') AS MO_CNT2 , TO_CHAR(SUM(H.SETL_APPR_AMT),'FM999,999,999,999') AS MO_SETL_APPR_AMT2 , TO_CHAR(SUM(H.PRCLTAXIN),'FM999,999,999,999') AS MO_PRCLTAXIN2 FROM CO_SUPP_COMP_MAST SUPP , ( SELECT OOI.SUPP_COMP_ID , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT) SETL_APPR_AMT , SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN) PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_MAST OOM , OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOM.ORDER_ID = OOS.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd1#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd1#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.SUPP_COMP_ID) A , (SELECT OOI.SUPP_COMP_ID , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT) SETL_APPR_AMT , SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN) PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_MAST OOM , , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT) SETL_APPR_AMT , SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN) PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_MAST OOM , OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOM.ORDER_ID = OOS.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_ID = BY OOI.SUPP_COMP_ID) D , ( SELECT OOI.SUPP_COMP_ID , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT) SETL_APPR_AMT , SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN) PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_MAST OOM , OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOM.ORDER_ID = OOS.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd1#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd1#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.SUPP_COMP_ID) E , (SELECT OOI.SUPP_COMP_ID , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT) SETL_APPR_AMT , SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN) PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_MAST OOM , OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOM.ORDER_ID = OOS.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD = '02' AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd1#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd1#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.SUPP_COMP_ID) F , (SELECT OOI.SUPP_COMP_ID , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT) SETL_APPR_AMT , SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN) PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_MAST OOM , OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOM.ORDER_ID = OOS.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD IN ('02', '04', '05') AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd1#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd1#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.SUPP_COMP_ID) G , (SELECT OOI.SUPP_COMP_ID , COUNT(*) CNT , SUM(OOS.SETL_APPR_AMT) SETL_APPR_AMT , SUM(OOI.PRCLTAXIN) PRCLTAXIN FROM OD_ORDER_MAST OOM , OD_ORDER_SETL OOS , OD_ORDER_ITM OOI WHERE OOM.ORDER_ID = OOS.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_ID = OOI.ORDER_ID AND OOM.ORDER_MDA_DIV_CD IN ('03', '06') AND TO_CHAR(OOS.SETL_APPR_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN REPLACE(#search_strt_ymd1#, '-') AND REPLACE(#search_end_ymd1#, '-') AND OOS.USE_YN='Y' GROUP BY OOI.SUPP_COMP_ID) H WHERE SUPP.SUPP_COMP_ID = A.SUPP_COMP_ID(+) AND SUPP.SUPP_COMP_ID = B.SUPP_COMP_ID(+) AND SUPP.SUPP_COMP_ID = C.SUPP_COMP_ID(+) AND SUPP.SUPP_COMP_ID = D.SUPP_COMP_ID(+) AND SUPP.SUPP_COMP_ID = E.SUPP_COMP_ID(+) AND SUPP.SUPP_COMP_ID = F.SUPP_COMP_ID(+) AND SUPP.SUPP_COMP_ID = G.SUPP_COMP_ID(+) AND SUPP.SUPP_COMP_ID = H.SUPP_COMP_ID(+)
SUPP.SUPP_COMP_ID IN
